concept.title: Using Python Novaclient
concept.shortdesc: You can use the python-novaclient command-line tool as an alternative to the Horizon web interface.

conbody.note: On 2012-05-08, HP Cloud Services reported a vulnerability in Nova API handling. When a security group that uses a protocol defined in an incorrect casing (for example, TCP rather than tcp) is created, later string comparisons fail causing security groups to be set incorrectly.
conbody.p: The version recommended for is the HP Extended Python Novaclient. The standard version is available from the Nova project page or via pip or pypm.
